title: [HELP WANTED] Someone, please build a custom SkiaSharp 1.68 package compatible with XF 2.5.1.527436
body:
Someone, please build a custom SkiaSharp 1.68 package. Before assembling, change the Xamarin Forms dependency to version 2.5.1.527436 (in *.csproj files).
I need this to build the simplest FlappyBird game for Windows 10 Mobile with SkiaSharp platform. :)

I tried to assemble SkiaSharp by myself, but catched some strange bugs with DepotTools, uhhh :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12032735/197130488-fca4d553-e241-4be9-b644-aaf65cfe5c97.png)


Great System Engeneers, help me, please :)
